creator: neil@JAMMConsulting.com
text:
Created attachment 25619
Screenshot of worker status page showing negative connections

When I took a look at my workers status page, it has -48 for the number of connections.  It should be positive or zero so there must be something wrong in the calculation somewhere.

I am using Tomcat 6.0.26 behind Apache 2.2.3 on a CentOS 5.5 server.

See BZ 56703: the implementation of the "connected" counter has been improved a lot for version 1.2.41. 

Closing this now, can be reopened it the next release proves to still not count correctly.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
